name: cpu-scheduling-algorithms
description: - 9 Algorithms are implemented. - Each process can have different number of CPU Burst Time and I/O Burst Time. - Gantt Chart and Timeline Chart for the given Schedule. - Context Switching Time. - Animation of the Time Log. - Comparison for Round Robin Algorithm for all time quantum. - Comparison between all the algorithms wrt Average Completion Time, Turn Around Time, Waiting Time and Response Time.
